Package de.lases.control.internal

Class SessionInformation

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.internal.SessionInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@SessionScoped public class SessionInformation extends Object implements Serializable
Encapsulates all information that is needed for the management of the session. More specifically, it holds the role of the user and his locale. It also offers a way to invalidate a session.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Get the user that is currently logged in. The user dto must be filled out with his id.
      Returns:
      A user dto with an id.

    • setUser

      public void setUser​(User user)
      Set the user that is currently logged in. This will also change the sessionId to avoid session fixation.
      Parameters:
      user - A user dto filled with an id for the user that is logged in.
